ch0153_00_prim/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been waiting for you to arrive.
ch0153_00_prim/0101_0701_02_10:
The two of us could melt ice with our fiery
passion for Pokémon battling. We should battle
together again soon.
ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_01_10:
Would you agree that it’s possible to overcome
any challenge through perseverance? Even ones
we’re quite unsuited for?
ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon and I are very intolerant of heat,
which is precisely why we decided to travel to
the Hoenn region to train.
ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_03_10:
We chose to put ourselves in a position where
we were forced to adapt and grow stronger,
and in the end, we did.
ch0153_00_prim/0601_0702_01_10:
It takes time, patience, and hard work to
accomplish a great deed.
ch0153_00_prim/0601_0702_02_10:
One must learn to persevere, like a flower that
waits under the snow for spring to arrive
once more.
ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_01_10:
What do we gain from battling?
What do we focus on during the fight?
ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_02_10:
If you gain something from a battle even when
you lose, then it was a battle worth having.
ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_03_10:
But if you win by compromising the very thing
you care most about, it’s all meaningless.
ch0153_00_prim/0602_0702_01_10:
A Pokémon battle is a fight between two
opponents, but it’s also a fight that we have
with ourselves.
ch0153_00_prim/0602_0702_02_10:
When you win a battle, do you feel confident
that you’ve triumphed over both your opponent
and yourself?
ch0153_00_prim/0603_0701_02_10:
synchronized collaboration between Trainer
and Pokémon...
ch0153_00_prim/0603_0701_03_10:
their souls like burning hot flames...
Oh, how I’d love to have a serious battle
against a few sync pairs like that!
ch0153_00_prim/0603_0702_01_10:
I know of a few fierce young Gym Leaders
in the world who meet that description.
ch0153_00_prim/0603_0702_02_10:
I have great respect for them, despite their age.
It would be a pleasure to battle any one of them.
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_01_10:
The entire island of Pasio was built specifically
for sync pairs.
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_02_10:
Volcanos, glaciers... Everywhere you look, this
place was designed to mimic the beauty of nature.
It’s truly a sight to behold!
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_03_10:
An artificial island, where Trainers and Pokémon
can battle in any environment they choose...
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_04_10:
it’s the perfect place to train! I have no doubt
that being here will help us grow stronger.
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0702_01_10:
In my home country, the winters are long and
cold, but the people’s hearts are warm.
ch0153_00_prim/0604_0702_02_10:
Trainers and Pokémon live in harmony, taking
care of one another.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_01_10:
It’s important to follow proper etiquette and
mind one’s manners.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_02_10:
It’s how you show others that you respect them.
Failure to do so will only reflect badly on you
in the end.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_03_10:
But I think you already understand that very
well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_04_10:
You give your absolute best in each and every
battle—the finest way to show respect to
your opponents.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_01_10:
Some sync pairs may try to use underhanded
methods to win.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_02_10:
But that does not mean that you should do the
same. Two wrongs do not make a right.
ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_03_10:
Nothing is more beautiful than triumphing over
your opponents fair and square.
ch0153_00_prim/1701_0701_01_10:
I’d like you to have this. I think it will be
quite useful.
ch0153_00_prim/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope it helps you on your journey
to grow stronger.
ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_01_10: Have you ever been to the Hoenn region?
ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s a lovely place. The climate is warm, and
it’s full of beautiful, green nature.
ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s like a second home to me. I’d love to give
you a tour someday.
ch0153_00_prim/2501_0702_01_10: I sometimes miss the town where I was born.
ch0153_00_prim/2501_0702_02_10:
Years can go by, we can travel far and wide,
but we all know deep inside...
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_01_10:
The Hoenn region has all sorts of interesting
sights and attractions.
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_02_10:
My favorite is most definitely the Mauville
Food Court in Mauville City.
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_03_10:
The ramen there is positively divine...
It’s a bit of a hidden jewel in Hoenn, so part
of me wants to keep its location a secret.
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_01_10:
Oh dear! Now I’m really craving a Mauville
Ramen Bowl.
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_02_10:
I’d love to find a dish here on Pasio that can
rival the Mauville Ramen Bowl in both flavor
and volume.
ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_03_10:
You haven’t seen anything like that, have you?
I need a jumbo-size meal that I can really
sink my teeth into!
ch0153_00_prim/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
What crisp, cool weather we’re having.
ch0153_00_prim/3002_0701_01_10:
If you get all your chores done in the morning,
you’ll have the whole evening to spend doing
more meaningful things.
ch0153_00_prim/3003_0701_01_10:
If you happen to come across anyone who
matches me in strength...do be sure to
introduce us.
ch0153_00_prim/3004_0701_01_10:
I’m so very indecisive when it comes to
choosing what to eat... There are simply
too many delicious options!
ch0153_00_prim/3005_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten yet this evening? I find that
eating late always upsets my poor stomach...
ch0153_00_prim/3006_0701_01_10:
The air is cool and silent at night...
It calms my nerves and allows me to focus.
